name: Color Speed - Rush Balls
description:
Stay focus, be concentrate, and move the ball carefully through the same color as you, ball pass through a roller coaster path, you get more points and more speed.

How to play:
Just touch the screen to move the ball left and right.
Be aware, Be Fast, Colors are changing over time and so speed!
Very easy to play, too hard to master.
Enjoy the ride!
